text:
I love the starteam tasks. Has anyone considered implementing "States". We want 
to be able to checkout based on a released state instead of always having to 
update and maintanin our labels.
creator: bouellette@imagictv.com
kevin.ketchum@mckesson.com
text:
This should be marked as a duplicate of 40995.  However, issue 46326 contains an consolidated patch that contains a fix for 40995

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 40995 ***
